mapper.select: select sm.menu_id, parent_id, title, code, name, menu_url, route_path, component_path, `type`, icon, parent_name, order_num from sys_user_role sur inner join sys_role_menu srm on srm.role_id = sur.role_id inner join sys_menu sm on sm.menu_id = srm.menu_id where sur.user_id = #{userId} order by order_num;
